# The sum Function

The sum function is a numerical function available in many programming languages. It is used to calculate the sum of a set of numbers, from both numeric and non-numeric values.

## What Package Contains It

The sum function is a part of the base R language, meaning that it does not need to be installed; it is available for use as soon as R is installed.

## When to Use It

The sum function is most often used in situations where the sum of an array of numbers needs to be quickly and easily calculated
